Nobody was there there is no place to wait also. We called the doctors he said he will in 30 minutes and since there was no place to sit also we went to nearby coffees shop to pass time. When we came back doctor had not come but clinic had opened. They did look at appointment but randomly assigned people numbers. 

Consultation was ok . He did something with a machine and when we came out receptionist says you have to pay 2000 for that test which turned out to be 2d echo. It was like not told before. There were two tests written . In total we had to shell 5000 rs for just one visit. I am 30 and I have slight bp problem . **** ** ***** ******** ***** *** ******* *** ***** **** ******Because as soon we got out the rep was there and asked if he could see the prescription. We did not know before but later realised. The medicine was not available in the next medicine. We came back but doctors had left . The medical rep says then I suggested it will come in a day or two. Next few days we tried multiple pharmacies apollo , medplus etc but could find. Though the doctors said we can contact on whatsapp he did reply and my earlier medicine was finishing. He did not take calls. Finally we had to give and go back to previous doctors. Those 5000 rs went down the drain and caused lot of trouble and tension for an already bp patient. Not recommended all reviews seem paid to me and look same.
